content.question: A uniform meterstick has three labeled points at the locations shown in the figure. The rotational inertia of the meterstick about its center is <math alttext=" One twelfth M L squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mi>M</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math> where <math alttext="M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>M</mi></math> is the mass and <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> is the length of the meterstick, respectively. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="I sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math>, <math alttext="I sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math>, and <math alttext="I sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math>, the rotational inertia of the meterstick about points <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="I sub A is greater than open parenthesis, I sub B equals I sub C, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>></mo><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, I sub B equals I sub C, close parenthesis, is greater than I sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="I sub A is greater than I sub B, which is greater than I sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="I sub C is greater than I sub B, which is greater than I sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="I sub A is greater than open parenthesis, I sub B equals I sub C, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>></mo><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
